content:
Hello Team and Community,
I'm trying to run Inferno test on the community edition
I have some test passed and some failed.

i'm getting this error in the URI when I'm trying to run Standalone Launch Sequence
image.png

https://fhbjgbiflinjbdggehcddcbncdddomop.chromiumapp.org/oauth2-request?result=failure&message=Could+not+make+access+token+requests.The+feature+has+been+deprecated,please+download+the+latest+Postman+app

image.png

Can anyone please guide me here if they encountered this error before?

Are you trying to use the Chrome extension called postman in some capacity it looks like the area you are receiving is related to that, if you read the failure message. It seems to be coming from something client side rather than from inferno.
